Producer: Graham Moloy, Andrea Iervolino, Monika Bacardi
Screenwriter: Bob Barlen, Cal Brunker, Bryan Thompson, Aaron Woodley
Synopsis: Swifty the fox discovers a devious plan by Otto Von Walrus to drill beneath the Arctic surface to unleash enough gas to melt all the ice. With help from his friends -- an introverted polar bear, a scatterbrained albatross, a crafty fox and two paranoid otters -- Swifty and the gang spring into action to foil Otto's plot and save the day.
Title: Arctic Dogs
